ygData.subject: Its all about the balance
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant made some classes that are easier to play and level but can be a little monotenous and some classes that are hard to solo with or level but have little
ygData.messageBody:
Verant made some classes that are easier to play
and level but can be a little monotenous and some
classes that are hard to solo with or level but have
little perks that make them interesting. Ofcoase some
classes seem like there both at first but end up pretty
straight forward later. Most people will end up playing
more than one character any way which is the beauty of
this game because it gives a totally different
experience for the same situation. We all know theres only
so many different ways you can kill a MOB and I
think verants done a good job of fleshing that out.
